summary: CompTIA certification study app with a Study Materials page showing 8 certification cards. User has requested several UI standardization fixes to be built.
architectural_notes: All cards should share the same fixed dimensions site-wide; only content changes per page
known_issues: CompTIA A+ card missing badge pill outline and has extra subtitle text not present on other cards

Set a uniform fixed card size site-wide for all certification cards across Dashboard, Certifications, and Study Materials pages. Measure the largest card currently rendered (based on the Study Materials page visible in the screenshots) and apply that as the standard min-height and fixed width for all cards, so card dimensions do not change as users navigate between pages ‚Äî only the card content changes.

Standardize the CompTIA A+ card on the Study Materials page to match the layout of all other certification cards. Specifically: (1) Add a badge pill outline to the 'A+' label in the card header, matching the pill style used on Security+, Network+, Linux+, Cloud+, CySA+, PenTest+, and CASP+ cards. (2) Remove the extra subtitle text 'Core 1 (220-1101) & Core 2 (220-1102)' from the card so it matches the clean header layout of other cards. Apply this same standardization to the A+ card wherever it appears across all pages (Dashboard, Certifications, Study Materials).
